alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Guadalupe County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 1:51PM MST until February 09 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, and Quay County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions and low visibility in freezing fog. This includes portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Guadalupe County; Quay County
